title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 29 April 2015 - XWiki

10:08 <gdelhumeau> Please hold your commit on the stable-7.0.x branch  
10:09 <gdelhumeau> I wish I could release this afternoon  
10:09 <cjd> aww, don't word it that way  
10:10 <cjd> "I will release this afternoon" (and there may be blood)  
10:10 <cjd> :)  
10:11 <gdelhumeau> Actually I was happy to re-use an English expression I have reviewed yesterday :)  
10:11 <cjd> "I wish I could" == "I can't"  
10:11 <gdelhumeau> BTW I don't forget your email  
10:12 <lucaa> has quit  
10:12 <cjd> ok thanks, I understand you're pretty busy anyway but I would like to work through a few changes before you get started on it  
10:13 <cjd> hopefully I can get my other stuff out of the way before you're ready to begin
